msbt.message: The end of the year is always so busy. Where DOES the time go?Oh ! I still haven't decided what to wear to the Countdown party!
Have you seen the event plaza yet? Countdown preparations are well underway. The main event starts at 11:00 PM, but I'm already so excited I can barely stand it, !
What an eventful year I've had I don't know whether to be relieved or grateful that is almost over. My stars, I wonder what this new year is going to throw my way?
The Countdown party is tonight, my dear. Are you coming? I simply must know! I suppose I'll survive if you're otherwise engaged. Still, I'll be keeping an eye out for you.
